io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi

Class Effect

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.Effect
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CustomEffect, PluginEffect

    public class Effect
extends Object
    The Effect class is a major class for representing effects. It allows effects from a Nanoleaf device to be easily manipulated.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DEFAULT_COLOR_TYPE
      As far as I know, the color type should always be HSB.
      static String DEFAULT_VERSION
      This is currently the latest version of the Effect specification, and the version that this library uses.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_VERSION

        public static final String DEFAULT_VERSION
        This is currently the latest version of the Effect specification, and the version that this library uses. Changing the version may break things.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_COLOR_TYPE

        public static final String DEFAULT_COLOR_TYPE
        As far as I know, the color type should always be HSB.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Effect

        public Effect()

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Gets the name of the effect.
        Returns:
        the effect name

      • setName

        public void setName(String name)
        Sets the name of the effect. Must not be "*static*", "*dynamic*", or "*solid*", as these names are reserved by Nanoleaf.
        Parameters:
        name - the new name for the effect

      • getEffectType

        public String getEffectType()
        Gets the effect type. This will always be either "plugin", "static", or "custom".
        Returns:
        the effect type

      • setEffectType

        public void setEffectType(String type)
        Sets the effect type. This must be set to "plugin", "static", or "custom".
        Parameters:
        type - the effect type

      • getVersion

        public String getVersion()
        Gets the effect version.
        Returns:
        the effect version

      • setVersion

        public void setVersion(String version)
        Sets the effect version. This should usually be the same as DEFAULT_VERSION.
        Parameters:
        version - the effect version

      • getColorType

        public String getColorType()
        Gets the color type for the effect. This will almost always be set to "HSB" (hue-saturation-brightness).
        Returns:
        the effect color type

      • getPalette

        public Palette getPalette()
        Gets the palette of the effect.
        Returns:
        the effect palette

      • setPalette

        public void setPalette(Palette palette)
        Sets the palette for the effect (required).
        Parameters:
        palette - a new palette

      • toJSON

        public org.json.JSONObject toJSON(String command)
        Converts the effect to JSON and adds a WRITE command to the object, for use with the NanoleafDevice.writeEffect(java.lang.String) method.
        Parameters:
        command - the command type
        Returns:
        the effect JSON with a command

      • toJSON

        public org.json.JSONObject toJSON()
        Converts the effect to JSON.
        Returns:
        the effect JSON

      • fromJSON

        public static Effect fromJSON(org.json.JSONObject json)
        Creates a basic effect from JSON. This method really shouldn't be used because it only initializes the effect with basic info. createFromJSON(org.json.JSONObject) should be used instead.
        Parameters:
        json - the effect JSON
        Returns:
        a new effect

      • createFromJSON

        public static final Effect createFromJSON(org.json.JSONObject json)
        Creates an effect from JSON. Effect properties the specific type of effect will be initialized for plugin, static, and custom effects.
        Parameters:
        json - the effect JSON
        Returns:
        a new effect

      • createFromJSON

        public static final Effect createFromJSON(String json)
        Creates an effect from JSON. Effect properties the specific type of effect will be initialized for plugin, static, and custom effects.
        Parameters:
        json - the effect JSON
        Returns:
        a new effect

      • fromJSON

        public static Effect fromJSON(String json)
        Creates a basic effect from JSON. This method really shouldn't be used because it only initializes the effect with basic info. createFromJSON(org.json.JSONObject) should be used instead.
        Parameters:
        json - the effect JSON
        Returns:
        a new effect
